Apply conductive gel.sentence: The technician prepares the conductive gel by ensuring it is at room temperature.
Apply conductive gel.subject: The technician

Apply conductive gel.sentence: The technician cleans the skin area where the conductive gel will be applied using an antiseptic wipe.
Apply conductive gel.subject: The technician

Apply conductive gel.sentence: The technician applies a sufficient amount of conductive gel onto the skin area evenly.
Apply conductive gel.subject: The technician

Apply conductive gel.sentence: The technician ensures that the conductive gel is spread uniformly to prevent air pockets.
Apply conductive gel.subject: The technician

Apply conductive gel.sentence: The technician checks the skin for any adverse reactions after applying the conductive gel.
Apply conductive gel.subject: The technician
